Part 1 Why Foster Kenyan Independent Media? Part 2 The Accountability Ecosystem in Kenya Today Part 3 Opportunities

Contact

For more information about this report contact kenyamedia@omidyar.com. For more information about Reboot contact hello@reboot.org.

Right now, deep-rooted challenges inhibit Kenyan journalists from holding their government accountable. This research report details these challenges, and was created for both investors and media actors. Our goal is to inspire innovation in the Kenyan media sector, and drive conversation around how to solve the barriers identified.

This report is a product of the Reboot Media program, which strengthens government watchdogs worldwide.
